comments: Look for User-Agent matches in this file order: 'bots', 'apps', 'libraries', 'browsers', and return the first entry matched, processing each entry in order in which they appear in the file.
If the match entry is from this file (i.e. not a bot), you can also match the User-Agent header against the 'devices' file to identity device and category.

entries.name: AIOHTTP
entries.description: Asynchronous HTTP Client/Server for asyncio and Python

entries.name: Apache HttpClient
entries.comments: While the Apache HttpClient can also be used in an Android podcast player app, it's mostly seen today on the server-side (bots).  Most Android apps use other HTTP libraries these days.

entries.name: AppleCoreMedia
entries.description: AppleCoreMedia library
entries.comments: This is a library used by a number of apps when progressively downloading podcasts. It is not (just) Apple Podcasts, and should not be treated as an Apple Podcasts useragent
examples: AppleCoreMedia/1.0.0.16G114 (iPod touch; U; CPU OS 12_4_2 like Mac OS X; en_us)
AppleCoreMedia/1.0.0.19A583 (Macintosh; U; Intel Mac OS X 10_15; en_us)
AppleCoreMedia/1.0.0.15G77 (iPhone; U; CPU OS 11_4_1 like Mac OS X; en_us)
AppleCoreMedia/1.0.0.17A860 (iPad; U; CPU OS 13_1_2 like Mac OS X; en_us)
AppleCoreMedia/1.0.0.16G78 (HomePod; U; CPU OS 12_4 like Mac OS X; en_us)
AppleCoreMedia/1.0.0.17J586 (Apple TV; U; CPU OS 13_0 like Mac OS X; en_us)

entries.name: aria2
entries.description: aria2 is a lightweight multi-protocol & multi-source command-line download utility

entries.name: Armadillo
entries.comments: This is a library, and not an app

entries.name: Async Http Client (java)
entries.description: The AsyncHttpClient (AHC) library allows Java applications to easily execute HTTP requests and asynchronously process HTTP responses.
entries.comments: Android compat is not supported (https://github.com/AsyncHttpClient/async-http-client/issues?q=is%3Aissue+android), UAs found in https://github.com/AsyncHttpClient/async-http-client/blame/25e12bfd03f6375a91ca264a32588fbba7ab900c/client/src/main/resources/org/asynchttpclient/config/ahc-default.properties#L15

entries.name: Bubble (no-code)
entries.description: The full-stack, no-code app builder for everyone

entries.name: Bun
entries.description: A fast all-in-one JavaScript runtime and toolkit

entries.name: CarrierWave (ruby)
entries.description: Classier solution for file uploads for Rails, Sinatra and other Ruby web frameworks

entries.name: Colly
entries.description: Lightning Fast and Elegant Scraping Framework for Go

entries.name: Dart
entries.comments: Default for the Dart programming language (Flutter uses Dart)

entries.name: Deno
entries.comments: Default for the Deno JavaScript/TypeScript runtime

entries.name: Down (ruby)
entries.description: Streaming downloads using net/http, http.rb, HTTPX or wget

entries.name: ffmpeg
entries.comments: ffmpeg is a library used within TuneIn, VLC, ffmpeg and other programs. This is the default useragent for the ffmpeg library.

entries.name: git-annex
entries.description: Allows managing large files with git, without storing the file contents in git

entries.name: Got (node)
entries.comments: Got is a HTTP library for NodeJs

entries.name: GStreamer
entries.comments: User-facing Linux media playback apps like Amarok

entries.name: Guzzle
entries.description: Guzzle is a PHP HTTP client that makes it easy to send HTTP requests and trivial to integrate with web services.

entries.name: HTTP:Tiny
entries.description: A small, simple, correct HTTP/1.1 client (Perl)

entries.name: http.rb
entries.description: HTTP (The Gem! a.k.a. http.rb) - a fast Ruby HTTP client with a chainable API, streaming support, and timeouts

entries.name: Just Audio
entries.description: just_audio is a feature-rich audio player for Android, iOS, macOS, web, Linux and Windows (Flutter/Dart)

entries.name: KaiOS Downloader
entries.comments: This is the KaiOS Downloader library, and this could refer to any app on this platform

entries.name: libsoup
entries.description: HTTP client/server library for GNOME

entries.name: lua-resty-http
entries.description: Lua HTTP client cosocket driver for OpenResty / ngx_lua.

entries.name: PRDownloader
entries.description: A file downloader library for Android with pause and resume support

entries.name: react-native-track-player
entries.description: A fully fledged audio module created for music apps. Provides audio playback, external media controls, chromecast support, background mode and more!

entries.name: resty (go)
entries.description: Simple HTTP and REST client library for Go

entries.name: rest-client (ruby)
entries.description: A simple HTTP and REST client for Ruby, inspired by Sinatra
entries.comments: Found mostly coming from Amazon IPs

entries.name: ExoPlayer (Android)
entries.comments: Must match after react-native-track-player. Unable to track down where everyone is copying yourApplicationName from, there are several small exoplayer examples with similar code.
